00268  // data from SQL, should be fine
00269 } elseif (eregi('^http\://.+\.(jpe?g|gif|png)$', $phpThumb->src)) {
00270  // assume is ok to passthru if no other parameters specified
00271 } elseif (!@is_file($phpThumb->sourceFilename)) {
00272  $phpThumb->DebugMessage('$CanPassThroughDirectly=false because !@is_file('.$phpThumb->sourceFilename.')', __FILE__, __LINE__);
00273  $CanPassThroughDirectly = false;
00274 } elseif (!@is_readable($phpThumb->sourceFilename)) {
00275  $phpThumb->DebugMessage('$CanPassThroughDirectly=false because !@is_readable('.$phpThumb->sourceFilename.')', __FILE__, __LINE__);
00276  $CanPassThroughDirectly = false;
00277 }
00278 foreach ($_GET as $key => $value) {
00279  switch ($key) {
00280   case 'src':
00281    // allowed
00282    break;
00283 
00284   case 'w':
00285   case 'h':
00286    // might be OK if exactly matches original
00287    if (eregi('^http\://.+\.(jpe?g|gif|png)$', $phpThumb->src)) {
00288     // assume it is not ok for direct-passthru of remote image
00289     $CanPassThroughDirectly = false;
00290    }
00291    break;
00292 
00293   case 'phpThumbDebug':
00294    // handled in direct-passthru code
00295    break;
00296 
00297   default:
00298    // all other parameters will cause some processing,
00299    // therefore cannot pass through original image unmodified
00300    $CanPassThroughDirectly = false;
00301    $UnAllowedGET[] = $key;
00302    break;
00303  }
00304 }
00305 if (!empty($UnAllowedGET)) {
00306  $phpThumb->DebugMessage('$CanPassThroughDirectly=false because $_GET['.implode(';', array_unique($UnAllowedGET)).'] are set', __FILE__, __LINE__);

00317 function SendSaveAsFileHeaderIfNeeded() {
00318  if (headers_sent()) {
00319   return false;
00320  }
00321  global $phpThumb;
00322  $downloadfilename = phpthumb_functions::SanitizeFilename(@$_GET['sia'] ? $_GET['sia'] : (@$_GET['down'] ? $_GET['down'] : 'phpThumb_generated_thumbnail'.(@$_GET['f'] ? $_GET['f'] : 'jpg')));
00323  if (@$downloadfilename) {
00324   $phpThumb->DebugMessage('SendSaveAsFileHeaderIfNeeded() sending header: Content-Disposition: '.(@$_GET['down'] ? 'attachment' : 'inline').'; filename="'.$downloadfilename.'"', __FILE__, __LINE__);
00325   header('Content-Disposition: '.(@$_GET['down'] ? 'attachment' : 'inline').'; filename="'.$downloadfilename.'"');
00326  }
00327  return true;
00328 }
00329 
00330 $phpThumb->DebugMessage('$CanPassThroughDirectly="'.intval($CanPassThroughDirectly).'" && $phpThumb->src="'.$phpThumb->src.'"', __FILE__, __LINE__);
00331 while ($CanPassThroughDirectly && $phpThumb->src) {
00332  // no parameters set, passthru
00333 
00334  if (eregi('^http\://.+\.(jpe?g|gif|png)$', $phpThumb->src)) {
00335   $phpThumb->DebugMessage('Passing HTTP source through directly as Location: redirect ('.$phpThumb->src.')', __FILE__, __LINE__);
00336   header('Location: '.$phpThumb->src);
00337   exit;
00338  }
00339 
00340  $SourceFilename = $phpThumb->ResolveFilenameToAbsolute($phpThumb->src);
00341 
00342  // security and size checks
00343  if ($phpThumb->getimagesizeinfo = @GetImageSize($SourceFilename)) {
00344   $phpThumb->DebugMessage('Direct passthru GetImageSize() returned [w='.$phpThumb->getimagesizeinfo[0].';h='.$phpThumb->getimagesizeinfo[1].';t='.$phpThumb->getimagesizeinfo[2].']', __FILE__, __LINE__);
00345 
00346   if (!@$_GET['w'] && !@$_GET['wp'] && !@$_GET['wl'] && !@$_GET['ws'] && !@$_GET['h'] && !@$_GET['hp'] && !@$_GET['hl'] && !@$_GET['hs']) {
00347    // no resizing needed
00348    $phpThumb->DebugMessage('Passing "'.$SourceFilename.'" through directly, no resizing required ("'.$phpThumb->getimagesizeinfo[0].'"x"'.$phpThumb->getimagesizeinfo[1].'")', __FILE__, __LINE__);
00349   } elseif ((($phpThumb->getimagesizeinfo[0] <= @$_GET['w']) || ($phpThumb->getimagesizeinfo[1] <= @$_GET['h'])) && ((@$_GET['w'] == $phpThumb->getimagesizeinfo[0]) || (@$_GET['h'] == $phpThumb->getimagesizeinfo[1]))) {
00350    // image fits into 'w'x'h' box, and at least one dimension matches exactly, therefore no resizing needed
00351    $phpThumb->DebugMessage('Passing "'.$SourceFilename.'" through directly, no resizing required ("'.$phpThumb->getimagesizeinfo[0].'"x"'.$phpThumb->getimagesizeinfo[1].'" fits inside "'.@$_GET['w'].'"x"'.@$_GET['h'].'")', __FILE__, __LINE__);
00352   } else {
00353    $phpThumb->DebugMessage('Not passing "'.$SourceFilename.'" through directly because resizing required (from "'.$phpThumb->getimagesizeinfo[0].'"x"'.$phpThumb->getimagesizeinfo[1].'" to "'.@$_GET['w'].'"x"'.@$_GET['h'].'")', __FILE__, __LINE__);
00354    break;
00355   }
00356   switch ($phpThumb->getimagesizeinfo[2]) {
00357    case 1: // GIF
00358    case 2: // JPG
00359    case 3: // PNG
00360     // great, let it through
00361     break;
00362    default:
00363     // browser probably can't handle format, remangle it to JPEG/PNG/GIF
00364     $phpThumb->DebugMessage('Not passing "'.$SourceFilename.'" through directly because $phpThumb->getimagesizeinfo[2] = "'.$phpThumb->getimagesizeinfo[2].'"', __FILE__, __LINE__);
00365     break 2;
00366   }
00367 
00368   $ImageCreateFunctions = array(1=>'ImageCreateFromGIF', 2=>'ImageCreateFromJPEG', 3=>'ImageCreateFromPNG');
00369   $theImageCreateFunction = @$ImageCreateFunctions[$phpThumb->getimagesizeinfo[2]];
00370   if ($phpThumb->config_disable_onlycreateable_passthru || (function_exists($theImageCreateFunction) && ($dummyImage = @$theImageCreateFunction($SourceFilename)))) {
00371 
00372    // great
00373    if (@is_resource($dummyImage)) {
00374     unset($dummyImage);
00375    }
00376 
00377    if (headers_sent()) {
00378     $phpThumb->ErrorImage('Headers already sent ('.basename(__FILE__).' line '.__LINE__.')');
00379     exit;
00380    }
00381    if (@$_GET['phpThumbDebug']) {
00382     $phpThumb->DebugTimingMessage('skipped direct $SourceFilename passthru', __FILE__, __LINE__);
00383     $phpThumb->DebugMessage('Would have passed "'.$SourceFilename.'" through directly, but skipping due to phpThumbDebug', __FILE__, __LINE__);
00384     break;
00385    }
00386 
00387    SendSaveAsFileHeaderIfNeeded();
00388    header('Last-Modified: '.gmdate('D, d M Y H:i:s', @filemtime($SourceFilename)).' GMT');
00389    if ($contentType = phpthumb_functions::ImageTypeToMIMEtype(@$phpThumb->getimagesizeinfo[2])) {
00390     header('Content-Type: '.$contentType);
00391    }
00392    @readfile($SourceFilename);
00393    exit;
00394 
00395   } else {
00396    $phpThumb->DebugMessage('Not passing "'.$SourceFilename.'" through directly because ($phpThumb->config_disable_onlycreateable_passthru = "'.$phpThumb->config_disable_onlycreateable_passthru.'") and '.$theImageCreateFunction.'() failed', __FILE__, __LINE__);
00397    break;
00398   }
00399 
00400  } else {
00401   $phpThumb->DebugMessage('Not passing "'.$SourceFilename.'" through directly because GetImageSize() failed', __FILE__, __LINE__);
00402   break;
00403  }
00404  break;
00405 }
00406

00409 $phpThumb->DebugTimingMessage('phpThumbDebug[5]', __FILE__, __LINE__);
00410 if (@$_GET['phpThumbDebug'] == '5') {
00411  $phpThumb->phpThumbDebug();

00415 function RedirectToCachedFile() {
00416  global $phpThumb, $PHPTHUMB_CONFIG;
00417 
00418  $nice_cachefile = str_replace(DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR, '/', $phpThumb->cache_filename);
00419  $nice_docroot   = str_replace(DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR, '/', rtrim($PHPTHUMB_CONFIG['document_root'], '/\\'));
00420 
00421  $parsed_url = phpthumb_functions::ParseURLbetter(@$_SERVER['HTTP_REFERER']);
00422 
00423  $nModified  = filemtime($phpThumb->cache_filename);
00424 
00425  if ($phpThumb->config_nooffsitelink_enabled && @$_SERVER['HTTP_REFERER'] && !in_array(@$parsed_url['host'], $phpThumb->config_nooffsitelink_valid_domains)) {
00426 
00427   $phpThumb->DebugMessage('Would have used cached (image/'.$phpThumb->thumbnailFormat.') file "'.$phpThumb->cache_filename.'" (Last-Modified: '.gmdate('D, d M Y H:i:s', $nModified).' GMT), but skipping because $_SERVER[HTTP_REFERER] ('.@$_SERVER['HTTP_REFERER'].') is not in $phpThumb->config_nooffsitelink_valid_domains ('.implode(';', $phpThumb->config_nooffsitelink_valid_domains).')', __FILE__, __LINE__);
00428 
00429  } elseif ($phpThumb->phpThumbDebug) {
00430 
00431   $phpThumb->DebugTimingMessage('skipped using cached image', __FILE__, __LINE__);
00432   $phpThumb->DebugMessage('Would have used cached file, but skipping due to phpThumbDebug', __FILE__, __LINE__);
00433   $phpThumb->DebugMessage('* Would have sent headers (1): Last-Modified: '.gmdate('D, d M Y H:i:s', $nModified).' GMT', __FILE__, __LINE__);
00434   if ($getimagesize = @GetImageSize($phpThumb->cache_filename)) {
00435    $phpThumb->DebugMessage('* Would have sent headers (2): Content-Type: '.phpthumb_functions::ImageTypeToMIMEtype($getimagesize[2]), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00436   }
00437   if (ereg('^'.preg_quote($nice_docroot).'(.*)$', $nice_cachefile, $matches)) {
00438    $phpThumb->DebugMessage('* Would have sent headers (3): Location: '.dirname($matches[1]).'/'.urlencode(basename($matches[1])), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00439   } else {
00440    $phpThumb->DebugMessage('* Would have sent data: readfile('.$phpThumb->cache_filename.')', __FILE__, __LINE__);
00441   }
00442 
00443  } else {
00444 
00445   if (headers_sent()) {
00446    $phpThumb->ErrorImage('Headers already sent ('.basename(__FILE__).' line '.__LINE__.')');
00447    exit;
00448   }
00449   SendSaveAsFileHeaderIfNeeded();
00450 
00451   header('Last-Modified: '.gmdate('D, d M Y H:i:s', $nModified).' GMT');
00452   if (@$_SERVER['HTTP_IF_MODIFIED_SINCE'] && ($nModified == strtotime($_SERVER['HTTP_IF_MODIFIED_SINCE'])) && @$_SERVER['SERVER_PROTOCOL']) {
00453    header($_SERVER['SERVER_PROTOCOL'].' 304 Not Modified');
00454    exit;
00455   }
00456 
00457   if ($getimagesize = @GetImageSize($phpThumb->cache_filename)) {
00458    header('Content-Type: '.phpthumb_functions::ImageTypeToMIMEtype($getimagesize[2]));
00459   } elseif (eregi('\.ico$', $phpThumb->cache_filename)) {
00460    header('Content-Type: image/x-icon');
00461   }
00462   if (!@$PHPTHUMB_CONFIG['cache_force_passthru'] && ereg('^'.preg_quote($nice_docroot).'(.*)$', $nice_cachefile, $matches)) {
00463    header('Location: '.dirname($matches[1]).'/'.urlencode(basename($matches[1])));
00464   } else {
00465    @readfile($phpThumb->cache_filename);
00466   }
00467   exit;
00468 
00469  }
00470  return true;
00471 }

00474 $phpThumb->SetCacheFilename();
00475 if (@is_file($phpThumb->cache_filename)) {
00476  RedirectToCachedFile();
00477 } else {
00478  $phpThumb->DebugMessage('Cached file "'.$phpThumb->cache_filename.'" does not exist, processing as normal', __FILE__, __LINE__);
00479 }

00489 if ($phpThumb->rawImageData) {
00490 
00491  // great
00492 
00493 } elseif (@$_GET['new']) {
00494 
00495  // generate a blank image resource of the specified size/background color/opacity
00496  if (($phpThumb->w <= 0) || ($phpThumb->h <= 0)) {
00497   $phpThumb->ErrorImage('"w" and "h" parameters required for "new"');
00498  }
00499  @list($bghexcolor, $opacity) = explode('|', $_GET['new']);
00500  if (!phpthumb_functions::IsHexColor($bghexcolor)) {
00501   $phpThumb->ErrorImage('BGcolor parameter for "new" is not valid');
00502  }
00503  $opacity = (strlen($opacity) ? $opacity : 100);
00504  if ($phpThumb->gdimg_source = phpthumb_functions::ImageCreateFunction($phpThumb->w, $phpThumb->h)) {
00505   $alpha = (100 - min(100, max(0, $opacity))) * 1.27;
00506   if ($alpha) {
00507    $phpThumb->setParameter('is_alpha', true);
00508    ImageAlphaBlending($phpThumb->gdimg_source, false);
00509    ImageSaveAlpha($phpThumb->gdimg_source, true);
00510   }
00511   $new_background_color = phpthumb_functions::ImageHexColorAllocate($phpThumb->gdimg_source, $bghexcolor, false, $alpha);
00512   ImageFilledRectangle($phpThumb->gdimg_source, 0, 0, $phpThumb->w, $phpThumb->h, $new_background_color);
00513  } else {
00514   $phpThumb->ErrorImage('failed to create "new" image ('.$phpThumb->w.'x'.$phpThumb->h.')');
00515  }
00516 
00517 } elseif (!$phpThumb->src) {
00518 
00519  $phpThumb->ErrorImage('Usage: '.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?src=/path/and/filename.jpg'."\n".'read Usage comments for details');
00520 
00521 } elseif (eregi('^(f|ht)tp\://', $phpThumb->src)) {
00522 
00523  $phpThumb->DebugMessage('$phpThumb->src ('.$phpThumb->src.') is remote image, attempting to download', __FILE__, __LINE__);
00524  if ($phpThumb->config_http_user_agent) {
00525   $phpThumb->DebugMessage('Setting "user_agent" to "'.$phpThumb->config_http_user_agent.'"', __FILE__, __LINE__);
00526   ini_set('user_agent', $phpThumb->config_http_user_agent);
00527  }
00528  $cleanedupurl = phpthumb_functions::CleanUpURLencoding($phpThumb->src);
00529  $phpThumb->DebugMessage('CleanUpURLencoding('.$phpThumb->src.') returned "'.$cleanedupurl.'"', __FILE__, __LINE__);
00530  $phpThumb->src = $cleanedupurl;
00531  unset($cleanedupurl);
00532  if ($rawImageData = phpthumb_functions::SafeURLread($phpThumb->src, $error, $phpThumb->config_http_fopen_timeout, $phpThumb->config_http_follow_redirect)) {
00533   $phpThumb->DebugMessage('SafeURLread('.$phpThumb->src.') succeeded'.($error ? ' with messsages: "'.$error.'"' : ''), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00534   $phpThumb->DebugMessage('Setting source data from URL "'.$phpThumb->src.'"', __FILE__, __LINE__);
00535   $phpThumb->setSourceData($rawImageData, urlencode($phpThumb->src));
00536  } else {
00537   $phpThumb->ErrorImage($error);
00538  }
00539 }
